election_record.label: New York 1817 State Senate, Middle District

overview.note: The Albany Argus (Albany, NY) lists 117 votes for Arunah Metcalf.

"The Election, in this State, opens to-day, and under circumstances never before witnessed since the people divided into two great political parties. There is but one candidate for the first office, and in most of the counties, the strife for members of the Legislature is confined to the present ruling party. It is not probable that many of the federalists will go to the polls, except in counties and districts where federal candidates are nominated. --This course is believed to be dictated by sound policy--It is not, as Mr. Coleman would infer, that 'federalism is abadndoned in the Western District'--but that opposition, after what we have experienced, is considered worse than useless--serving only to draw out and consolidate the whole force of democracy, which otherwise would, from its inconsistency, divide and fall to pieces." Ontario Repository (Canandaigua, NY). April 29, 1817.
The Albany Argus (Albany, NY) lists Muntley Wolworth as "Abunky Walworth" and John F. Camdensberry as "John Falmdersberry."
Some sources list Rochil Vanhosen as "Botchi Vanhozen."

sub_unit.name: Chenango
sub_unit.note: Jabez D. Hammond received 1 vote as Jabez Hammond.

sub_unit.name: Delaware
sub_unit.note: John Lounsberry received 1 vote as John Lousberry.
The New York Columbian lists 731 votes for John Lounsberry and 725 votes for Jabez D. Hammond.

sub_unit.name: Colchester
sub_unit.note: There were no returns reported from Colchester.

sub_unit.name: Davenport
sub_unit.note: Jabez D. Hammond received 3 votes as Jabez Hammond.

sub_unit.name: Hancock
sub_unit.note: There were no returns reported from Hancock.

sub_unit.name: Meredith
sub_unit.note: Jabez D. Hammond received 4 votes as Jabez Hammond.

sub_unit.name: Roxbury
sub_unit.note: Jabez D. Hammond received 1 vote as Jabez Hammond.

sub_unit.name: Greene
sub_unit.note: Robert Campbell received 7 votes as Robert Cammel.
The New York Columbian and the Catskill Recorder (Catskill, NY) list 681 votes for John Lounsberry.

sub_unit.name: Orange
sub_unit.note: Jabez D. Hammond received 2 votes as John D. Hammond.
